    • Uses of Conditional in sorcer.service

      Classes in sorcer.service that implement Conditional 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Condition
      A Condition specifies a conditional eval in a given service context for its free variables in the form of path/eval pairs with paths being guard parameters of a closure expression.
